description: They are concerned about the impact on their studies, employment or shot at permanent residency. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Indian students fear they may be the ultimate losers as New Delhi, Ottawa bicker
title_page: Indian students fear they may be the ultimate losers as New Delhi, Ottawa bicker | The Straits Times
maintext:
NEW DELHI - Ms Komalpreet Kaur Mann thought she was well on her way to fulfilling her late fatherâ€™s dream for her to study and work in Canada.
She had a place in a Canadian college to begin a one-year course in personal support care in January and had already paid C$1,500 (S$1,520) to secure it.
